channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump urges US Supreme Court to delay TikTok ban
item.description: Trump says that he could negotiate a 'political resolution' for TikTok if the high court intervenes.

item.title: Sportscaster Greg Gumbel dies at age 78
item.description: Greg Gumbel, a longtime CBS sportscaster, has died from cancer, according to a statement from family released by CBS on Friday. He was 78.

item.title: US teacher jailed in Russia is formally designated as wrongfully detained
U.S. homelessness jumps to another record high, amid affordable housing shortage
item.description: The annual federal count finds more than 770,000 people living in shelters or outside. It cites rising rents and the recent surge in migrants as key f...

item.title: Another jackpot surpasses $1 billion. Is this the new normal?
Winning ticket for $1.22 billion lottery jackpot sold in California, Mega Millions says
item.description: At least one Mega Millions player has plenty of dough to ring in the New Year after drawing the winning number.

item.title: 'It's still in shambles': Can Boeing come back from crisis?
item.description: Safety issues with the Boeing 737 Max and mass employee strikes made for a challenging 2024.

item.title: Trump asks the Supreme Court to delay the start of the TikTok ban
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump asked the Supreme Court on Friday to pause the potential TikTok ban from going into effect until his administration can p...

item.title: Ukrainians hope for a New Year prisoner exchange with Russia
item.description: There have been just ten exchanges of prisoners of war in 2024 but families want their loved ones back.

item.title: How old English sea shanties inspired Cape Verdean singer
item.description: Carmen Souza's latest album is inspired by the little-known British influence on the Cape Verde islands.

item.title: Greg Gumbel, CBS Sports broadcasting legend, dies at 78
item.description: Greg Gumbel, the renowned CBS Sports anchor and commentator, has died of cancer at the age of 78.

item.title: Trump opposes TikTok ban, asks Supreme Court for time to resolve via negotiations
item.description: The Supreme Court will hear arguments Jan. 10 in TikTok's challenge of a law that could lead to a ban of the widely popular platform.

item.title: Romeo and Juliet actress Olivia Hussey dies aged 73
item.description: The Golden Globe-winning actress was best known for her role as Juliet in the 1968 film adaptation of the Shakespeare play.

item.title: Costco egg recall for salmonella receives FDA's most severe designation
item.description: The FDA has classified its recall of eggs sold under Costco's Kirkland brand as a Class I recall, a designation reserved for instances of the highest ...

item.title: 12/27: CBS Evening News
item.description: CBS Sports broadcasting legend Greg Gumbel dies at 78; Nurse adopts teen mom after caring for babies in NICU

item.title: California store sells winning $1.22 billion Mega Millions ticket
item.description: One lucky ticket sold in Northern California won an estimated $1.22 billion jackpot in Friday's Mega Millions drawing just days before the new year.

item.title: Winning numbers drawn for estimated $1.22 billion Mega Millions jackpot
item.description: A winner of the Mega Millions jackpot could either take the cash payout of $549.7 million or the $1.22 billion annuity paid out over 30 years.

item.title: Winning ticket for $1.22 billion lottery jackpot sold in California, Mega Millions says
item.description: After three months without anyone winning the top prize in the lottery, a ticket worth an estimated $1.22 billion was sold in California for the drawi...
